title: Round the twist Series 1 - Volume 1 (Captioned)
creator_contributor_role: Australian Children's Television Foundation, production company
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: A series of humorous and adventurous stories about the remarkable Twist family who leave the city to make their new home in a lighthouse. This volume includes "Skeleton on the dunny", "Birdso", "A good tip for ghosts", "The cabbage patch fib", and "Spaghetti pig-out".
